text: Nelsan Ellis is dead. The actor, best known for starring on “ True Blood ” and “ Elementary, ” died at age 39. Now celebrities are reacting on Twitter and paying tribute to the late star. See tweets below. Ellis ’ death was announced on Saturday by his manager. Emily Gerson Saines said in a statement, “ Nelsan has passed away after complications with heart failure. He was a great talent, and his words and presence will be forever missed. ” On “ True Blood, ” Ellis starred as Lafayette Reynolds. He held the regular role for the duration of the seven - season series, earning two Satellite Awards, an Entertainment Weekly honor, and a NewNowNext Award.
